thread.title: Pandora Stock Decimated by 35 Percent in a Day

title: Pandora Stock Decimated by 35 Percent in a Day
text:
Pandora Stock Decimated by 35 Percent in a Day 
Billboard Biz Saturday 24th October, 2015 
A tidal wave of bad news sent shares of Pandora Media cascading 35 percent on Friday, wiping out more than a third of the value of the digital music company. 
The catalyst for the decline was multifold, beginning Thursday with Pandora's lackluster earnings report and hitting a crescendo on Friday when about a half-dozen analysts downgraded the stock. 
The company reported $311.6 million in revenue in the third quarter, which was up 30 percent year-over-year but about $1 million short of Wall Street's expectations. Then it said revenue in the fourth quarter wouldn't be more than $330 millio...
